name: DO IT
description: I made this game for the Community Game Jam 2019 with the theme "The Game is a Liar"... but I missed the deadline.  At that point I forgot to upload it, but hey, better late than never!  The object of the game is simple, follow the instructions when told to DO IT.  You score points for each level you pass, but if you fail to heed the instructions you lose.  WASD + Space to move.  The game was made in Gamemaker Studio 2, my first game in the engine.  Enjoy!
